events.name: Green Bay Packers at Detroit Lions

headlines.description: — Jordan Love had plenty of time to pass, and took full advantage.
headlines.shortLinkText: Love matches career high with 4 TD passes, lifting Packers to 31-24 win over Lions

events.name: Kansas City Chiefs at Dallas Cowboys

headlines.description: — Dak Prescott and the Dallas Cowboys still face long odds in trying to rally for a spot in the playoffs.
headlines.shortLinkText: Prescott's Cowboys overcome Mahomes' fourth-down magic in 31-28 Thanksgiving win over Chiefs

headlines.description: — Joe Burrow returned to the field and delivered a poised performance despite not playing since Week 2.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bengals win in Burrow's return, taking advantage of 5 Ravens turnovers in a 32-14 victory

headlines.description: — After beating the Eagles on the Super Bowl champions' home turf, it was time for rookie Bears coach Ben Johnson to bare arms. Oh, and go bare-chested.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ben Johnson flexes shirtless in locker room after Bears' 5th straight win, 24-15 over reeling Eagles
